title: Wanted: font-family + font server add-on for Firefox
content:
If there are any typophile developers out there who would like to help with a project to bring richer typography to the web, ping me in the comments on my blog. Thanks!

author: davidc

comments.content:
Can you explain the technology behind your idea? I am not sure if text rendering in Firefox can be controlled by a plug-in.  
It seems Mozilla is already working on the @font-face support: [https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show\_bug.cgi?id=70132](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011010340/https:/bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=70132 "https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show\_bug.cgi?id=70132")

Also, why should there be central font server for open-licensed font? If the browser supports the embedding, the font files can be stored on ANY server.
